name: No More Apples
description:
Behold, my second game, first one that I decided to actually release. 

It's super simple endless runner that I created solely to check whether I can or not.

For art and music, I used free assets from Unity store. Big thanks to the people who created that, you rock. 

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/characters/pixel-adventure-1-155360

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/gui/icons/2d-simple-ui-pack-218050

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/arcade-game-bgm-17-210775

The game itself was developed using Unity + C#. 

The frog  audio is my own, which makes me a voice actor now, I guess.

Have fun!

PS. Updates might come if I come up with something new. 

Currently I'm trying to solve framerate issues on some devices but on S8 that I have it works good enough.
